did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: George P. Shultz and Robert P. Crisara "United Steelworkers of America, Local 3536: National Planning Association Case Study #10" and Related Documents,
did.origination:
Shultz, George P.;
Crisara, Robert P.
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Report and related documents on Local 3536 of the United Steelworkers of America by George P. Shultz and Robert P. Crisara.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a report on Local 3536 of the United Steelworkers of America by George P. Shultz and Robert P. Crisara. Also included are tables and collected material related to Shultz and Crisara's research.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
